World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 3 月 4 日星期一 13:19:19 GMT 120
Israel's Gantz tests Netanyahu partnership in WashingtonBenny Gantz, the Israeli war cabinet member visiting Washington this week, tells a story of how his mother, a Holocaust survivor, once had an operation in Germany performed by a Palestinian doctor from Gaza. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 13:06:26 GMT VMZHSP5LVNPOFB75IUVENVHTXI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israels-gantz-tests-netanyahu-partnership-washington-2024-03-04/James Mackenzie世界中东
EU countries split over support for nuclear energyEuropean Union member states showed their divisions on nuclear energy policy on Monday, with one camp led by France promoting the technology and another, led by Austria and Germany, pushing to prioritise renewable energy sources instead. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 13:05:54 GMT DPGZ4Z5HTVPBPABO4AMA4MFI7U https://www.reuters.com/sustainability/climate-energy/eu-countries-split-over-support-nuclear-energy-2024-03-04/Kate Abnett, Julia Payne可持续发展气候与能源
UN rights chief says China committing violations in Xinjiang, TibetU.N. human rights chief Volker Turk on Monday called on China to implement recommendations to amend laws that violate fundamental rights, including in the Xinjiang and Tibet regions. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 13:05:33 GMT MSPT7DRKKVJ75ORG73TWJEDYLY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/un-rights-chief-says-china-committing-violations-xinjian-tibet-2024-03-04/Reuters世界中国
Pakistan's Imran Khan-backed party not eligible for reserved parliament seats, poll panel rulesPakistan's election commission on Monday ruled that a party aligned with candidates backed by former premier Imran Khan is not eligible for extra reserved seats in the legislature, another blow to the embattled group's governing prospects. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 12:46:12 GMT W3HAF3XR65KLNFI6W2IGM4M2ZY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistans-imran-khan-backed-party-not-eligible-reserved-parliament-seats-poll-2024-03-04/Reuters世界亚太地区
Ghana anti-LGBTQ bill could derail IMF support if signed into lawThe signing into law of an anti-LGBTQ bill passed by Ghana's parliament could derail the International Monetary Fund's $3 billion loan package and lead to a loss of $3.8 billion in World Bank financing over the next five to six years, the finance ministry said in a document seen by Reuters on Monday. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 12:44:12 GMT ZRDQU74NXRIU3B7C6QXETDBGIM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ghana-anti-lgbtq-bill-could-derail-imf-support-if-signed-into-law-2024-03-04/Reuters世界非洲
Ukraine needs long-term plan for food exports to EU, official saysThe European Union must allow Ukrainian food producers access to EU markets long term, rather than just extending measures year by year, leaving them at the mercy of political pressures, a senior Ukrainian official said on Monday. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 12:39:02 GMT JJQ7ZD6NSNN3BD5SFQSUXK6ZLI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-needs-long-term-plan-food-exports-eu-official-says-2024-03-04/Reuters世界欧洲
Portuguese police seize 1.3 tons of cocaine hidden in frozen fishPortuguese police seized over 1.3 tons of cocaine hidden inside frozen fish due to be distributed across Europe, detaining seven men of different nationalities as part of the operation, they said on Monday. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 12:35:45 GMT ZWEAL7UBPRLAJBRZBRHZKEVPV4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/portuguese-police-seize-13-tons-cocaine-hidden-frozen-fish-2024-03-04/Reuters世界欧洲
Albania, wary of Russia, reopens Soviet-era air base to NATONATO member Albania, which has no fighter jets of its own, opened a rebuilt Soviet-era air base to serve NATO aircraft on Monday amid an increased threat from Russia, Prime Minister Edi Rama said. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 12:31:52 GMT OS4OB6GXSBOL7LJQRBWQ2PQOIA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/albania-wary- Russia-reopens-soviet-era-air-base-nato-2024-03-04/Reuters世界欧洲
Exclusive: EU wants fossil fuel sector to help pay to combat climate change, draft showsThe European Union is set to call for the fossil fuel industry to help pay for fighting climate change in poorer countries under a United Nations target, a draft document shows, as nations prepare for talks this year on a global finance goal. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 12:28:31 GMT OIPIYH6HPBLDJEZKAHUUYI4N4Q https://www.reuters.com/sustainability/sustainable-finance-reporting/eu-wants-fossil-fuel-sector-help-pay-combat-climate-change-draft-shows-2024-03-04/Kate Abnett可持续发展气候与能源
Poland urges EU sanctions on Russian, Belarusian farm productsPoland, seeking to meet the needs of protesting farmers, plans to ask the European Union to put sanctions on Russian and Belarusian agricultural products, Prime Minister Donald Tusk said on Monday during a visit to the Lithuanian capital Vilnius. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 11:55:29 GMT HD2E7OWKKZILVOPNLQ5VDZJO6A https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/poland-urges-eu-sanctions- Russian-belarusian-farm-products-2024-03-04/Reuters世界欧洲
Hamas says it presses on with Gaza truce talks without IsraelisHamas said on Monday it was pressing on with talks on securing a ceasefire in Gaza despite Israel's decision not to attend, while Washington appeared to take a tougher line in demanding its ally Israel ease the plight of suffering civilians. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 11:35:21 GMT EODJBRUUZZIJ5JD2SMY3QCJJDU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hamas-says-it-presses-with-gaza-truce-talks-without-israelis-2024-03-04/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Bassam Masoud世界中东
